sentences.english: The aim of this article is to study the jade design thought in Kaogongji.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究《考工记》玉器设计思想。

sentences.english: According to Artificers' Record, there seems to have been planning system of imperial palace before Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《考工记》表明先秦宫城规划形成了制度。

sentences.english: Three, the design esthetics thought of jade in Kaogongji.

definition: the Rites of Zhou (in Confucianism)
Classic of Rites
miscellany of writing from the Western Han (aka Former Han)
Zhou Bi Suan Jing, or Chou Pei Suan Ching, one of the oldest Chinese texts on astronomy and mathematics
Dream Pool Essays by Shen Kuo 沈括[Shen3 Kuo4], book on various fields of knowledge, the first to describe the magnetic needle compass
Essential skill to benefit the people, sixth century encyclopedia of agricultural knowledge by Jia Sixie 賈思勰|贾思勰[Jia3 Si1 xie2]
"Collection of the Most Important Military Techniques", book published in 1044 during the Northern Song Dynasty
Luxuriant Dew of the Spring and Autumn Annals, ideological tract by Han dynasty political philosopher Dong Zhongshu 董仲舒[Dong3 Zhong4 shu1]
“Methods of Sima”, also called “Sima Rangju’s Art of War”, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], written by Sima Rangju 司馬穰苴|司马穰苴[Si1 ma3 Rang2 ju1]
History of the Southern States Wu and Yue (traditional rivals), compiled by Han historian Zhao Ye 趙曄|赵晔[Zhao4 Ye4], 10 extant scrolls
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
"Strategies of the Warring States", chronicle of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC), possibly written by Su Qin 蘇秦|苏秦[Su1 Qin2]
Zhou dynasty (1046-221 BC)
Shuowen Jiezi, the original Han dynasty Chinese character dictionary with 10,516 entries, authored by Xu Shen 許慎|许慎[Xu3 Shen4] in 2nd century
to smelt and cast
